extendedInfo.description: Famous Quotes lets you check out a huge collection of famous quotes from well-known individuals. Read up on some of the wise, and not-so-wise words from some modern celebrities, politicians, and more. These quotes are taken from both literature and spoken word and span through a large time period. Simply swipe left and right to see the next quote in the list. A random quote is generated for you every time you open the app. Use the search function to search for quotes by keyword or browse through the list of more than 100 individuals. Save your favorite quotes by tapping on the star. Share quotes with friends by using Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and more. Read through thousands of facts, thoughts, and philosophies from some of the greatest minds throughout history.Quotes from over 100 people	â¢	Aristotle	â¢	Benjamin Franklin	â¢	George Washington	â¢	Mark Twain	â¢	Bill Cosby	â¢	Leslie Nielson	â¢	Tom Hanks	â¢	Bob Marley	â¢	Jimi Hendrix	â¢	Oprah Winfrey	â¢	Many more!!!
